DOC.brief_summary: This study explores the effectiveness of message framing, loss-framed vs. gain-framed messages on oral health in Iran.
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness of Gain- Versus Loss-framed Health Messages to Improve Oral Health Among Iranian Adolescents
DOC.detailed_description: This is a study to explore the impact of two pamphlets with gain-framed and loss-framed messages on brushing and flossing attitudes, intentions , behaviors and clinical characteristics among a sample of adolescent students.
DOC.criteria: They are not involved in the oral health education Ability to understand Persian language Adolescents attending high schools in Qazvin Does not meet inclusion criteria
